title: This approach is widely used in GUI frameworks like WinForms where controls can have dozens and even hundreds of events.

inline_content.Text: This approach is widely used in GUI frameworks like WinForms where controls can have dozens and even hundreds of events.

title: Note that
EventHandlerList
c

is not thread-safe, so if you expect your class to be used from multiple threads, you will need to add lock statements or other synchronization mechanism (or use a storage that provides thread safety).
